shop.title: A&M Bakery
shop.subtitle:
We were formerly known as A&M Bakery Cafe. We are currently operating as a web based business open from 8:00 AM until 4:00 PM Monday through Friday.

We offer delicious baked goods.  Please submit your orders 48 hours in advance to george@ambakery.net. You can find us at the Garfield and Irvington Garden Club Farmers Markets in the spring and summer. Drop by and try our  delicious baked goods.  We offer delivery in the downtown area. You can also arrange for curbside pickup.

shop.subtitle:

We sell a variety of CBD oils, shakes, supplements and herbs that cleanse the system - just to name a few.
